body.name: PayLessHere 8 inch Memory Foam Mattress Cooling Gel Green Tea Infused Mattress,CertiPUR-US Certified,Breathable Bed Mattress for Cooler Sleep Supportive & Pressure Relief,White Twin
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 44 mins
features: 👑- 【Medium hardness mattress】 - A healthy spine needs a suitable gel mattress. Each mattress has been certified by CertiPUR US and does not contain any harmful substances, so that you and your children can sleep safely. The mattress adopts air flow gel memory foam, which can adapt to the micro pressure points of the body and bring higher comfort.

👑- 【External ventilation】 - The refreshing green tea gel provides good airflow, heat dissipation, and absorbs excess moisture from the body. Green tea memory foam infused with cooling gel ensures decompression and temperature regulating sleep.

👑- 【Suitable for various bed frames】 - This best mattress keeps you cool and actively adjusts the temperature throughout the night, while its high-quality green tea soaking solution ensures a clean feeling every night. The green tea memory foam mattress in the box is designed for safety, durability, performance, emission and content.

👑- 【Material and structure】 - In order to improve the support and heat dissipation effect, the Cooling Gel Memory Foam mattress adopts a three-layer full foam system design, including memory foam, comfort layer and high-density base support foam, to bring extreme comfort.

👑- 【 Precautions 】 - Please allow 24-72 hours for the mattress to return to its original state. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warm room. In cold temperatures, during childbirth, the mattress may take longer to recover from compression. The expansion time of a mattress may vary depending on the surrounding environment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Best Gel Memory Foam: Our memory foam mattress provides a good sleeping surface. This medium hardness mattress will respond to your body's temperature and begin to shape you as you lie down. Then, the weight is evenly distributed along the surface, relieving stress points and helping you sleep more without tossing and turning. Green tea brewing can have a calming effect, allowing you to spend a completely relaxed night. Our mattresses are made of CertiPUR US certified foam and are wrapped in a soft fabric covering. CARE INSTRUCTIONS UPON RECEIPT: Layering: Memory foam surface+ultra soft foam+high-density base support layer, rich terry fabric protective cover.Memory foam mattresses Memory Mattress Foam Mattress Memory foam mattresses mattresses Memory Mattress Foam Mattress Memory Foam Mattress Gel Memory Foam Mattress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than IKEA!!!
reviews.reviewText: Superior comfort! I thought I was going to be disappointed in the quality of this mattress due to its low price point, but I was pleasantly surprised at how genuinely comfortable it is and it feels high end; quality materials, no chemical smell at all, and it springs right back to form! Paranthetically, I should mention that once unwrapped, it completely filled out in about 5 minutes, not a couple days as mentioned in some of the other reviews (altitude or aridity, maybe?).I have slept better on this in the last three weeks than I've slept in the last eight years on a $400 mattress topper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress at a budget friendly price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 12 year old and he loves it. There was very little smell from off-gassing. It was firmed up and ready for use within a few hours of unpacking. He says it’s very comfortable and though I’ve only been on it for a few moments at a time, I seems to have plenty of give for comfort and support without being too soft. It’s works great for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is great we opened it the night before we set up our daughter’s new bed and it was fully expanded the next morning. It is very comfortable and fits her new bed frame perfectly. We are not able to feel the bars underneath and are very satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The height looks shorter than it says but soft and comfort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for price
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about purchasing this bed but I was shocked at not only the quality but the comfort. Super easy to unravel & inflates instantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this mattress! I purchased the 10” Full size mattress. It came in sooner than expected which was a huge plus! I ordered this mattress because of the price and didn’t expect much since it was so affordable, but I was surprisingly impressed by the comfort and quality! Super easy to unpack and grew to its full size within an hour! I could go on and on about this mattress I LOVE IT! Definitely repurchasing the same mattress in the future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable used it on a daybed in our guest room! Definitely was a great purchase! Priced right also! Guests complimented the softness!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about purchasing this bed in a box because of, well, let’s be real. It’s a bed in a box. However it arrived early, packaged well and fully rose to the 10inches within hours. My 9 year old son says it is super comfortable. Do not hesitate to buy it!

I wasn’t sure what to expect after reading the reviews, but I couldn’t be more pleased with my new mattress. Knowing warmth is important for the mattress to expand quickly, I placed a heater in the room (I’m in Canada and it’s Septembrrrr) the day before it arrived so the room would be toasty warm.As a result, the mattress began expanding the moment I cut the plastic – and within 3 hours had reached 95% and within 24 hours was the full 10 inches. The middle inflated faster than the ends, but the ends are compacted much more than the middle – so it made sense. The mattress has no defects – including order. It was packaged very well and had silica packs to absorb moisture.Softness: On a scale of 1 (Firmest) to 10 (Softest) I would rate the mattress a 6.5 – and so comfy!
Expanded well within 24 hours. Guests say it is comfortable and we haven’t noted any compression or falling.
This mattress is the best for its price. Firm but not too bad. Pretty comfortable I’d say.

Very comfortable and looks as described, good value for price.I ordered 6 inch size, it feels little thinner (less than 6) but size doesn’t compromise its comfort ability.It looks great as well, way better than other spring mattresses which are 2-3 times expensive than this.Worth a try

Après avoir lu les commentaires, j'ai commandé se matelas dans la grandeur king et épaisseur de 6po.Et j'ai été plus que étonnée et satisfaite!!!Je m'attendais à de la qualité, mais pas à se point!Avec mon ancien matelas, j'avais de gros mal de dos. Avec celui-ci, en l'espace de 2 jours mon mal de dos a grandement diminué. Le matelas est plutôt ferme, mais grâce à la mousse, c'est plus que confortable.Quand mon copain (de 200lbs) la essayer pour la première fois, je suis sortie de la pièce pour 2mins et en revenant, il c'était endormi 😂Meilleur choix de matelas et surtout pour le prix. Ma cousine a le Bloom à 1200$, et il l'équivaux !Merciiiiiii !
